Use Q(t) to approximate the average rate of water flow during the 24-hour period. Indicate units of measure.

features.html: The rate at which water flows out of a pipe, gallons per hour, is given by a differentiable function R of time t. The table above shows the rate as measured every 3 hours for a 24-hour period.
